group_1.narration: "The Yukuni City All-Stars Festival@is set to kick off soon!"
"Featured at the direct sales shop,@you'll be able to find local specialties in addition to@numerous exhibits highlighting the history and@traditions of Yukuni City."
"Moreover, the local street art prodigy "Urara Yume"@will be performing on stage in a unit!"
"Join us for an event jam-packed with exciting content!@For more information, please check out the@Yukuni City Tourism Association's website!"

group_1.textCenter: (I thought it was still some time away, but it's@already here.)
Now that the day of the show has arrived,@are you all ready?
Well, you have some time before your performance,@so go ahead and have fun as you wish.
If you don't unwind your nerves before the show@starts, you'll just end up exhausted.
The next meeting will be 30 minutes in advance,@at this location.

group_1.textLeft: Phew...

group_1.textRight: Is your singing voice all right?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, thanks to you.@I will do my best for the solo part today! ♪

group_1.textRight: It goes without saying, but here's hoping@for the best!
Hm, have you not received the pamphlets for the@Yukuni Hot Springs Village yet?
I was going to leave them here for you to hand@out, but...

group_1.textLeft: The proprietress of the Kichijo Inn went to get@them a few minutes ago.

group_1.textRight: Right, right. Thanks, Rabi-chan.
Rabi, have you filled the vegetable racks yet?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I was a bit late, but I just finished.

group_1.textRight: They're the vegetables that healed your body.
So I hope lots of people will take this opportunity@to learn about them.
I'm sure your Grandpa and your Dad would both@be glad to see that.

group_1.textLeft: That's right.

group_1.textRight: Good morning, Senpai.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, morning, Shirogane.

group_1.textCenter: It seems our stall is in good shape.
(Now all I have to do is wait for our turn at@the Festival...)

group_1.textRight: Yo, Miura. How are the preparations going?

group_1.textLeft: I've finished checking and everything is in order.@Would you like one, if you don't mind?

group_1.textRight: I'm a local too, ya know? I've eaten deer and rabbit.

group_1.textLeft: Well, anyhow, I will be rooting for you today.

group_1.textRight: I'm counting on you too.
Oh, there you are, Kuroda.@They want us to check the exhibit one last time!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, seriously? Sorry, I'll be right there.

group_1.textRight: Oh, I also need to speak with Miura, so can you@go back first?

group_1.textLeft: Alright, no problem.
What is it that you want to talk to me about?

group_1.textRight: One's about the exhibition.
The interview article is ready, and I'm happy@with the way it turned out.
Thanks for helping me out.

group_1.textLeft: Is that what this is about?@You don't have to say thanks again.

group_1.textRight: That's the kind of thing I like about you, Miura.
And, the other thing is about Kuroda.

group_1.textLeft: K-Kuroda, is it?

group_1.textRight: ...I have a hunch he's gonna confess to me.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:103401:effect_shake]Pff―!

group_1.textRight: Hey, are you okay?!

group_1.textLeft: I was just taken by surprise...!@That said, why did you mention it to me...?

group_1.textRight: I think I'll probably just say yes if he doesn't@say anything weird.
So, am I gonna go out with him or what?@I'm not sure yet.
I've seen other girls grow apart from their friends@because they put their boyfriends first.
I still wanna be friends with you, Miura.@That's all I wanted to tell you.

group_1.textLeft: Haitani...
It's not being a friend to dislike someone just@because you've grown apart a little.
That's what I believe.
So don't worry about anything, and accept@Kuroda with open arms.

group_1.textRight: Mhm, thank you.

group_1.textLeft: Today's MC will be this street performer duo!

group_1.textRight: Us, Urara and Kurara of Yukuni City!

group_1.textLeft: Let's start the five-second countdown before@the doors open!

group_1.textCenter: [chara:800100:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy][chara:103601:effect_emotion_joy_0]Welcome to the Yukuni City All-Stars Festival!
